text: seongseoui baegseongdeul-iyeo neohuie ge seonjijaga dolaehayeoss-euni seonjija deul ihuui ildeul-eul neohuiege seolmyeong halila ineun neohuiga bog-eumdo gyeong-go do uliege ileuji anihaessdago malhaji anhdolog ham-ila sillo bog-eum gwa gyeong-goga neohuiege dolaehayeoss-euni hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneunghasi nila
